nodes.text: The RK-94 Protector Droid was a model of battle droid that was created by the Gran cyborg Ayor-v9, who used them on Hoth during the Galactic War and considered his droids to be his "family."
The RK-94 Protector Droid appears a type of enemy in the Bounty Hunter class mission "Digging His Own Grave" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
